scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:GroupMembers_Title}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($pagesListId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('pagesListId'))
    #if ($context.Group.GroupType != 'Joinless')
    • #end
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('paged-members.vm') #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.groupMemberManagement') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
